document.full_text: dominique strauss-kahn resigned as head of the imf, saying he needs all his energy to fight charges that he sexually assaulted a hotel maid, prompting an immediate political tug-of-war over his job on thursday.
document.title: imf chief resigns, debate on successor heats up
lines_and_colors: dominique strauss-kahn resigned as head of the imf, saying he needs all his energy to fight charges that he sexually assaulted a hotel maid, prompting an immediate political tug-of-war over his job on thursday.
